title: PHPmysqli_get_client_stats()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPmysqli_get_client_stats()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return stats about client per-process:
<?php
$con = mysqli_connect("localhost","my_user","my_password","my_db");
print_r(mysqli_get_client_stats());
?>
Definition and Usage
The mysqli_get_client_stats() function returns client per-process statistics.
Syntax
mysqli_get_client_stats()
Technical Details
Return Value:
An array with client stats on success. FALSE on failure
PHP Version:
5.3+

★
+1
